body.description: Biotene Dry Mouth Management Kit is ideal for around the clock relief of dry mouth symptoms when used as part of your daily oral health care routine. This oral care kit contains Biotene Dry Mouth Oral Rinse, Moisturizing Spray and OralBalance Moisturizing Gel to help relieve symptoms of dry mouth, including bad breath, stickiness in the mouth, dryness in the mouth and chapped lips. Formulated using a mouth moisturizing system, Biotene Dry Mouth Oral Rinse provides up to four hours of soothing, lubricating relief. For overnight use, Biotene Dry Mouth OralBalance Moisturizing Gel features a moisture lock formula in discreet, easy to apply packaging. Use Biotene Dry Mouth Spray on the go for convenient relief from dry mouth that fits in your purse, backpack or travel bag. Dry mouth rinse, gel and spray are formulated for adults and children 12 years and older. For long-lasting relief of dry mouth symptoms, choose Biotene, the #1 dry mouth brand trusted by dentists.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oral care kit This oral care kit contains the Biotene Dry Mouth Oral Rinse, Moisturizing Spray, and Oral Balance Moisturizing Gel to help relieve symptoms of dry mouth, including bad breath, stickiness in the mouth, dryness in the mouth, and chapped lips. Helps reduce sleep interruptions Biotene was shown to reduce interruptions caused by dry mouth by 44.8%* *Improvement vs. water after 28 days use in a clinical study Works instantly Biotene's mouth moisturizing formulation is clinically proven to effectively relieve dry mouth symptoms instantly for up to 4 hours*. *As measured by a 28 day clinical study Manage your symptoms 24 hours a day This Biotene Variety Pack contains a mouth moisturizing system that refreshes and moistens the mouth to help maintain a healthy oral environment.

1 in 4 people suffer from dry mouth Dry mouth is a common condition that affects one in four adults. Not only does it cause discomfort, but it can also lead to embarrassment, irritability and self-consciousness. It can also lead to a disturbance in sleep and a withdrawal from social situations. Click on the boxes to find out more about dry mouth problems. What is dry mouth? Dry mouth occurs when your mouth doesn't produce enough saliva to stay moist. It is a common condition, yet it is often not reported or properly managed. Common symptoms may include dryness in the mouth, bad breath, chapped lips, or waking up at night feeling thirsty. Impact on oral health Dry mouth can lead to more than just discomfort — it can have long-term effects on your oral health and can cause several problems, including up to a 3x greater risk of cavities, gingivitis, and mouth infections. Causes of dry mouth The primary cause of dry mouth is medication usage. There are more than 500 over-the-counter and prescription medicines that can cause dry mouth. Plus, the more medicines you take, the greater your chances are of developing a dry mouth. 1 in 4 people suffer from dry mouth What is dry mouth? Impact on oral health Causes of dry mouth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these products. They are the only products that don’t burn my mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really helps dry mouth, excellent product! Great price in this package deal-super low cost!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I think it works
reviews.reviewText: I found the mouthwash has an odd mouth feel. A little slimy, but tolerable. Far superior to the raspy dry mouth I am fighting. I only use it at night just before going to bed, and I can make it for about 4 hours. I re-rinse and I’m good til I get up. The rest of the products come in handy: the drops in the car, the gel and spray for odd times. I have them positioned around the house and cars so I can grab one when needed. I like the package I bought because I could try the different ones without having to buy a larger size in case there was something I either didn’t like or it didn’t work for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped so much
reviews.reviewText: The Biotene Dry Mouth Management Set has been a total game-changer for me. Dealing with persistent dry mouth, I've tried various products, but this set is a standout. The mouthwash provides instant relief, soothing my mouth without the overpowering taste found in some other brands. The gel is a handy on-the-go solution, offering a quick moisture boost. Together, they form a dynamic duo that has significantly improved my daily comfort. If you're grappling with dry mouth issues, this set is a reliable companion for effective and convenient management. 🌿👄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dry mouth relief
reviews.reviewText: The flavor of Biotene is similar to toothpaste. This pack has the spray, gel, and mouth rinse. I find that the gel works the best as it stays in my mouth longer. I keep it by my bedside. I will buy this product again. I recommend that you try this product if you have issues with dry mouth.
